name: SCP 087 Road to Hell
description:
Feel the fear of infinity!
Welcome to the first test of fear.
You are guilty, and you have the task to test all the possibilities of fear that contains project number 87.
No one else before could cope with the current task, but you can?
The secret laboratory has long been conducting psychological experiments on people.
Today is the day of horrors, when you need to start fighting your fear and live 20 minutes of testing.
The story of horrors begins with the first chapter of our series of games.
The most terrible game is a game where you are constantly under psychological influence.
To achieve the best dive in the horror game you need to wear headphones.
Horror is a genre with a million audience and we came to please you with new impressions from games.
Scary games keep you constantly in suspense, and here is no exception.

Play and enjoy the game.
